claim: Minions was directed by Steven Spielberg and Chris Nolan.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Leading directors , including Martin Scorsese , Steven Spielberg , George Lucas , James Cameron , Woody Allen , Terry Gilliam , the Coen Brothers , Ridley Scott , Paul Thomas Anderson , Christopher Nolan , David Lynch , and George A. Romero , have cited Kubrick as a source of inspiration , and in the case of Spielberg , collaboration .
